title: She Returns From War
description: Four years after the horrific events in Leadville, a young woman from England, Victoria Dawes, sets into motion a series of events that will lead Cora and herself out into the New Mexico desert in pursuit of Anaba, a Navajo witch bent on taking revenge for the atrocities committed against her people.File Under :   Dark Fantasy  [ The Wilder West | Unseen Forces | A Conspiracy | Fight For Life ]From the Paperback edition.
author: Lee Collins
